channel.title: Editing Shop Prices
channel.description: This is so impossisible! I need help to edit shop prices?!! Major (rep++) to a good Answer!

item.title: Editing Shop Prices
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

My item.cfg says this for a manta ray…

item = 391	Manta_ray	A_rare_catch.	384.961576069808	     384.961576069808	  446.03290933615

But is the game is costs 488gp

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Shop Prices
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

The first number is high alch, the second is shop price, which automatically get raised when you’re buying from shop, and the third number is low alch. The rest are stats.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Shop Prices
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well that is for regular items, because they have their alching value preset somewhere else, but if u want to make it on silab items it would be something like this.

item = 11785	Dark_bow	A_dark_bow.	30000000	30000000	30000000	0	0	0	0	25	0	0	0	0	25	0	0

That says the item id is 11785, the items is a dark bow, the description is “a dark bow.”, the buy and sell prices are 30m and the alch price is 30m, the alch price is the middle one. It also says that it will add 25 to range attack and range defence bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Shop Prices
item.dc:creator: @rsc rsc
item.description:
@rsc wrote:

the first two sequences of numbers in item.cfg for example:

item = 6570 Fire_Cape A_cape_of_fire. 100000000 1000000000

its the 100000000 and 1000000000 you have to change.

Read full topic
